TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XpsDocumentNotificationLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates whether a write operation to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] document or a print queue sends back page-by-page and document-by-document progress notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When notification is not enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>. When it is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target while it sends progress notifications for each page and document.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The notification status is not indicated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel ReceiveNotificationDisabled = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel ReceiveNotificationEnabled = int32(1)
